Title: Relates to claims for unjust conviction
Summary: Relates to claims for unjust conviction.
LawCode: Amd ยง8-b, Ct Claims Act; amd ยง612, Tax L; add ยง668-h, Ed L; add ยง85-d, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the court of claims act and the tax law, in relation to claims for unjust conviction; to amend the education law, in relation to establishing wrongful conviction recovery scholarships; and to amend the civil service law, in relation to allowing additional credits for the wrongfully convicted
